description: The great-granddaughter of David II of the Georgian Bagratid dynasty, the first queen of Georgia, Tamar. Her reign brought the country to the peak of its power. Not only did she foster culture and economy, but she also knew how to use these means to strengthen her military power.
taunt_1: Dictators like you have ripped the soul from this land.
taunt_2: Dictators like you have ripped the soul from this land.
taunt_3: The day of your penance has come, wrongdoers.
taunt_4: The day of your penance has come, wrongdoers.
anger_1: I may have lost this battle, but there is still time to right this wrong.
anger_2: You will regret this day! Attacking my people was the gravest mistake you ever made.
plead: My light is fading in the night.
nervous_1: Feasting on human misery? Away with you.
nervous_2: Feasting on human misery? Away with you.
victory_1: Ha! Hardly the valiant fight I would expect from such a noble knight.
victory_2: Why do you not defend yourselves? What are you waiting for?
victory_3: I'm sorry, knight, but you leave me no choice.
victory_4: And once again, the day of a sinner draws to a close.
thanks: Your goods have arrived, I am extremely grateful.
congrats: Well fought; fighting seems to be your specialty.
boast: Ha! Hardly the valiant fight I would expect from such a noble knight.
help: You must help me, a rogue seeks to take revenge on me!
extra: The morning dawns; it is six o'clock.
siege: The walls will crumble; the desert will turn red. The fortress of our enemies will fall before nightfall.
no_attack_1: Raising an army is not cheap; I cannot afford the men.
no_attack_2: I will not attack; you must find another way. Have you tried negotiations?
no_help_1: I cannot help you; ask me another time, but I promise nothing.
no_help_2: Can we not arrange for them to surrender without this senseless waste of life?
no_sent: I cannot send what I do not have, my good knight.
sent: Do not worry; your goods are on the way.
team_winning: We are vastly superior to them; they will surely surrender.
team_losing: We must stay strong, or we will lose this war.
help_sent: Here, take these men. But keep yourself out of trouble next time.
will_attack: The talks have failed; I will begin my attack.
